snippet: Twitter said a New York Times article reporting apparent special treatment of football players by the local police had been mistakenly flagged as spam by an outside organization.
abstract: Twitter accidentally blocks link to New York Times article on lenient treatment by police for Florida State University football players, marking content as spam for about an hour.
lead_paragraph: Twitter said a New York Times article reporting apparent special treatment of football players by the local police had been mistakenly flagged as spam by an outside organization.

headline.main: Twitter Mistakenly Labels F.S.U. Article as Spam, for a Time
headline.print_headline: Twitter Mistakenly Labels F.S.U. Article as Spam, for a Time
